abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed additional credit and the
            reallocated amount for Pakistan will help finance the costs
            associated with the new activities that include, (i) repairs
            of breaches in canal embankments, removal of debris
            deposited in the canal prisms and repair of control
            structures, drainage structures and water storage
            infrastructure; (ii) re construction and/r repairs of
            damaged roads, culverts and bridges; (iii) repair and/or
            reconstruction of public buildings such as schools, health
            facilities and buildings; (iv) repair of damaged drinking
            water supply and sanitation systems; and (v) assisting
            households and families to reestablish their livelihood by
            helping in the reconstruction of their houses, restarting
            their agricultural activities by providing agricultural
            technology packages, restocking their livestock devastated
            by the floods and earthquake and providing livelihood
            support to households and individuals affected by the
            disaster. There will be no change to the ongoing project activities.
